items.name: Flat White
items.description: Bold ristretto shots of expresso get the perfect amount of steamed whole milk to create a not too strong, not too creamy, just right flavour

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Dark rich expresso lies in wait under a smoothed, and stretched layer of thick foam. It's truly the height of our baristas' craft

items.name: Caffè Latte
items.description: Our dark, rich espresso balanced with steamed milk and a light layer of foam. A perfect milk forward warm up.

items.name: Caffè Américano
items.description: Espresso shots are topped with hot water to produce a light layer of crema. The result is this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.

items.name: Vanilla Latte
items.description: Smooth and subtly sweet, meets steamed milk and vanilla syrup, creating a delightful twist on a beloved espresso classic

items.name: Caffè Mocha
items.description: We combine our rich, full-bodied espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, then top it off with sweetened whipped cream. The classic coffee drink to satisfy your sweet tooth.

items.name: Caramel Macchiato
items.description: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup is marked with espresso and topped with caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish

items.name: White Chocolate Mocha
items.description: Our signature espresso meets white chocolate sauce and steamed milk, then is finished off with sweetened whipped cream in this white chocolate delight

items.name: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
items.description: We add freshly steamed milk and cinnamon dolce flavored syrup to our classic espresso, then top it off with sweetened whipped cream and cinnamon dolce topping. You're in for a treat

items.name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
items.description: We combine our rich, full-bodied espresso with vanilla-flavored syrup, milk and ice, then top it off with caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish.

items.name: Iced Cinnamon Dolce Latte
items.description: We add milk and cinnamon dolce flavored syrup to our signature espresso and ice, then top it off with sweetened whipped cream and cinnamon dolce topping. You're in for a treat

items.name: Iced Caffe Mocha
items.description: We combine our rich, full-bodied espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce, milk and ice, then top it off with sweetened whipped cream. The classic coffee drink to satisfy your sweet tooth.

items.name: Iced White Chocolate Mocha
items.description: Our signature espresso meets white chocolate sauce, milk and ice, then is finished off with sweetened whipped cream in this white chocolate delight.

items.name: Freshly Brewed Coffee
items.description: Roasted coffee that's soft, mellow and flavorful. Easy-drinking on its own and delicious with milk, sugar or flavored with vanilla, caramel or hazelnut.

items.name: Iced Coffee
items.description: Freshly brewed Starbucks® Iced Coffee Blend served chilled and lightly sweetened over ice.

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description: Steamed milk with vanilla- and mocha-flavored syrups. Topped with sweetened whipped cream and chocolate-flavored drizzle.

items.name: White Hot Chocolate
items.description: A traditional hot chocolate beverage made with white chocolate and steamed milk topped with whipped cream.

items.name: Chai Tea Latte
items.description: Black tea infused with cinnamon, clove, and other warming spices is combined with steamed milk and topped with foam for the perfect balance of sweet and spicy.

items.name: Green Tea Latte
items.description: Smooth and creamy matcha is lightly sweetened and served with steamed milk. A perfect zen.

items.name: Lightly Sweet Chai Tea Latte
items.description: A less-sweet take on our beloved Classic Chai Tea Latte. Black tea--infused with cinnamon, clove and other warming spices--is steamed with milk and sweetened with liquid cane sugar.

items.name: Brewed Tea
items.description: Enjoy one of our many brewed tea's

items.name: Iced Passion Tango Tea
items.description: Our blend of hibiscus, lemongrass and apple is lightly sweetened and handshaken with ice for a refreshingly vibrant tea.

items.name: Iced Passion Tango Tea Lemonade
items.description: Our blend of hibiscus, lemongrass and apple is lightly sweetened and handshaken with ice, lemonade and of course, passion.

items.name: Iced Black Tea Lemonade
items.description: Premuim black tea is lightly sweetened, then shaken with refreshing lemonade and ice for this Arnold Palmer- inspired beverage.

items.name: Caramel
items.description: Buttery caramel syrup meets coffee, milk and ice for a rendezvous in the blender. Then whipped cream and caramel sauce layer the love on top.

items.name: Mocha
items.description: Mocha sauce, Frappuccino® roast coffee, milk and ice all come together for a mocha flavor that'll leave you wanting more.

items.name: Java Chip
items.description: We blend mocha sauce and Frappuccino® chips with coffee and milk and ice, then top with whipped cream and mocha drizzle to bring you endless java joy.

items.name: Vanilla Bean Crème
items.description: This rich and creamy blend of vanilla bean, milk and ice topped with whipped cream takes va-va-vanilla flavor to another level.

items.name: Green Tea
items.description: We blend sweetened premium matcha green tea, milk and ice and top it with sweetened whipped cream to give you a delicious boost of energy.

items.name: Double Chocolatly Chip Crème
items.description: Rich mocha-flavored sauce meets up with chocolaty chips, milk and ice for a blender bash. Top it off with sweetened whipped cream and mocha drizzle for a real party in your mouth.

items.name: Strawberry & Crème
items.description: Strawberries and milk are blended with ice and topped with a swirl of whipped cream. Sip on the crème of the crop.

items.name: Very Berry Hibiscus Refresher
items.description: Real fruit juice and whole blackberries shaken with Green Coffee Extract for a boost of natural energy, served over ice.

items.name: Cool Lime Refresher
items.description: Real fruit juice, mint and a lime slice shaken with Green Coffee Extract for a boost of natural energy, served over ice.

items.name: Ethos Bottled Water
items.description: Ethos® Water raises awareness and provides children with access to clean water. Every time you buy a bottle, 5 cents US (10 cents in Canada) is contributed to the Ethos® Water Fund, part of the Starbucks Foundation. Over $7.38 million has been granted to help support water, sanitation and hygiene education programs in water-stressed countries – helping over 430,000 people around the world.

items.name: San Pellegrino Water
items.description: The essential refresher. Our sparkling natural mineral water will quench your thirst with effervescent ease.

items.name: Frappuccino Beverage (Bottle)
items.description: This delicious, lowfat blend of coffee, milk and rich, chocolaty taste is the perfect drink for chocoholics on the move.

items.name: Croissant
items.description: This classic Croissant is made with 100 percent butter to create a golden, crunchy top and soft, flakey layers inside. The perfect match for a cup of Pike Place Roast.

items.name: Cheese Danish
items.description: Our take on the traditional cheese Danish pairs flakey croissant dough with reduced-fat cream cheese. It’s a simple recipe with simple ingredients you’re sure to love.

items.name: Lemon Loaf
items.description: This citrusy, buttery, moist lemon pound cake is topped with a sweet vanilla icing. Cake has never been so refreshing.

items.name: Double Chocolate Loaf
items.description: Dense chocolate loaf cake is loaded with chunks and chips of rich chocolate then topped with a creamy chocolate ganache icing. Oh yeah, this is one doubly-decadent slice of heaven.

items.name: Sausage, Cheddar & Egg Sandwich
items.description: A Southern-style sausage patty, fluffy eggs and aged Cheddar cheese are served on a perfectly toasty English muffin. An iconic breakfast sandwich that reminds you why you love breakfast.

items.name: Bacon, Gouda & Egg
items.description: Sizzling Applewood smoked bacon, melty aged Gouda and a parmesan frittata are layered on an artisan roll for extra smoky breakfast goodness.

items.name: KIND - Almond Coconut Cashew Chai
items.description: A sweet & nutty blend of toasted coconut, almonds and cashews is combined with exotically spiced chai for a rich and delicious snack you’ll savor from beginning to end.

items.name: KIND - Blueberry Vanilla Cashew
items.description: A chewy blend of blueberries and cashews, combined with the sweet taste of vanilla. It’s goodness on the go.

items.name: KIND - Peanut Butter Dark Chocolate
items.description: A satisfying blend of peanuts and dark chocolate bound together in honey. This snack bar delights from the first bite till the last.

items.name: KIND - Salted Caramel Dark Chocolate Nut
items.description: Whole cashews and pecans are combined with the smooth, rich flavors of salted caramel and dark chocolate. It may seem indulgent, but with just 5g of sugar, this snack only tastes like dessert.
